conclusion: Analyze forces acting on the block and plank to determine condition for F1.
Gravitational force on block is 8 N.
Normal force from plank acts horizontally to the right.
Horizontal force F1 acts to the left.
Gravitational force on plank is 4 N.
Normal force from wall acts horizontally to the left.
Frictional force from block acts horizontally to the right.
For block to move upward, F2 must be greater than 8 N.
For block to move horizontally, F1 must be greater than frictional force 0.20N.
